sv.purpose: Att objektivt bedöma grad av alkoholabstinens hos patienter med abstinenssyndrom.
sv.use:
Använd för att utvärdera grad av alkoholabstinens hos patienter med abstinenssyndrom. The revised Clinical Institute Withdrawal Assessment for alcohol scale (CIWA-Ar) består av följande tio parametrar:

- Illamående och kräkningar (0-7p)
- Tremor (0-7p)
- Svettning (0-7p)
- Ångest (0-7p)
- Psykomotorisk oro (0-7p)
- Taktila förändringar (0-7p)
- Hörselförändringar (0-7p)
- Synförändringar (0-7p)
- Huvudvärk (0-7p)
- Orienteringsgrad (0-7p)
 
Maximal poängsumma uppgår till 67 poäng, och resultatet tolkas enligt:

<= 15p - lindrig abstinens
16-24p - måttlig abstinens
>= 25p - svår abstinens

en.purpose: To assess severity of alcohol withdrawal using a 10-item scale.
en.use:
Use to assess severity of alcohol withdrawal. The revised Clinical Institute Withdrawal Assessment for alcohol scale (CIWA-Ar) is a 10-item scale based on the following parameters:

- Nausea and vomiting (0-7p)
- Tremor (0-7p)
- Paroxysmal sweats (0-7p)
- Anxiety (0-7p)
- Agitation (0-7p)
- Tactile disturbances (0-7p)
- Auditory disturbances (0-7p)
- Visual disturbances (0-7p)
- Headache, fullness in head (0-7p)
- Orientation and clouding of sensorium (0-4p)

Maximum score is 67 points, and the result is interpreted as follows:

≤ 15p - mild alcohol withdrawal
16-24p - moderate alcohol withdrawal
≥ 25p - severe alcohol withdrawal

other_details.references: Sullivan JT, Sykora K, Schneiderman J, Naranjo CA, Sellers EM. Assessment of alcohol withdrawal: the revised clinical institute withdrawal assessment for alcohol scale (CIWA-Ar). Br J Addict. 1989 Nov;84(11):1353-7. PubMed PMID: 2597811.

gt0001.description: The revised Clinical Institute Withdrawal Assessment for alcohol scale (CIWA-Ar) är ett skattningssystem som bidrar med effektiv och objektiv bedömning av abstinensgrad hos patienter med abstinenssyndrom. En poäng om ≤ 15p indikerar lindrig, 16-24p måttlig och ≥ 25p svår abstinens.

gt0006.description: Sample questions - Do you feel sick to your stomach? Have you vomited?

gt0007.description: With arms extended and fingers spread apart.

gt0011.description:
Sample questions - Have you any itching, pins and needles sensations, any burning, any numbness or do you feel
bugs crawling on or under your skin?

gt0012.description: Sample questions - Are you more aware of sounds around you? Are they harsh? Do they frighten you? Are you hearing anything that is disturbing to you?

gt0013.description:
Sample questions - Does the light appear to be too bright? Is its colour different? Does it hurt your eyes? Are you
 seeing anything that is disturbing to you?

gt0014.description:
Do not rate for dizziness or lightheadedness. Sample questions - Does your head feel
different? Does it feel like there is a band around your head?

gt0015.description: Sample questions - What day is this? Where are you? Who am I?

gt0038.description: Severity of alcohol withdrawal based on assessment of score generated in accordance with CIWA-Ar.

gt0001.description: The revised Clinical Institute Withdrawal Assessment for alcohol scale (CIWA-Ar) is a 10-item scale intended to provide an efficient and objective method to assess severity of alcohol withdrawal. A score of ≤ 15p indicates mild, 16-24p moderate and ≥ 25p severe alcohol withdrawal.

 seeing anything that is disturbing to you?

Do not rate for dizziness or lightheadedness. Sample questions - Does your head feel
